About the job
            

 
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you a software engineer that thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team where you'll be contributing to our strategic product line, that’s looking to reshape industries and change the way people work and learn.Our strategic product line includes: Crossover: An AI-powered hiring platform that sifts through millions of applicants per year to find the top 1% of global remote talent. We're breaking down geographical barriers and making high-paying jobs accessible to professionals worldwide, regardless of their location.gt.school: An online education platform that uses advanced data collection, algorithms, and AI-generated content to empower students to learn at their own pace. Our adaptive learning system fills knowledge gaps, accelerates learning, and helps students master a whole grade level on a subject within weeks.Data-driven Sales: This initiative leverages data and AI algorithms to streamline the sales process across a portfolio of over 100 software products. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, synchronization, modeling divergences and data inconsistencies.
What we offer: The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in AWS serverless and no-code/low-code patterns.The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are reshaping industries and making a difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 120-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!What You Will Be Doing Developing cloud-native backends and implementing data processing algorithms using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
What You Won’t Be Doing Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
Basic RequirementsPrincipal Software Engineer key responsibilities At least 4 years of experience writing production code for the server side of web applications.At least 2 years of experience being the primary technical contributor for a development team OR software product.At least 1 year of hands-on experience developing using cloud patterns (any cloud vendor).An openness to learn to use generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.
Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.

From L1 agents all the way to the top, our organization provides stellar service to every customer on every product.Deferring to gut feeling and managerial instinct. Crossover Job Code: LJ-3125-PK-Lahore-SeniorProductS.018
About the job

About the job
            

 
OverviewJhpiego is an international non-profit health organization affiliated with The Johns Hopkins University, USA. For morethan 40 years and in over 150 countries, Jhpiego has worked to prevent the needless deaths of women and their families.Jhpiego is dedicated to improving the health of women and families in developing countries. In Pakistan’s Punjab province,DMPA-SC is being newly introduced, consistent with the Government of Punjab’s vision to accelerate the province’sprogress toward achieving its FP2030 goals to improve the MCPR, offer equal access to quality FP services, and expandmethod choice for all womenJhpiego, seeks District Coordinator to lead program at the district level, ensure planning, management and technical qualityof all district-based activities in close consultation with Provincial Manager.Responsibilities  Lead the program planning and implementation at the district level.  Develop and maintain strong coordination with all relevant stakeholders like Deputy Commissioner, Chief Executive Officer Health, District Health Officer, Focal Person of IRMNCH, District Population Welfare Office and district coordinators of other MCH & FP component partners at district level.  Support the Government of Punjab to facilitate uptake and continuation of DMPA-IM and DMPA-SC and FP overall in the district by improving service quality and accessibility for FP methods, overall in the public and private sectors, and by promoting FP decision-making, choice, and positive experience of care among women, men, and couples  Plan and guide implementation on following interventions in district;  Generate demand and community engagement  Strengthen health worker capacity and quality through supportive supervision  Ensure program and research data management at health facility and district level  Establish follow-up and support systems for self-injectors  Manage day-to-day implementation of program and research interventions  Coordinate with Jhpiego Provincial office and Country office for seeking guideline and providing update regarding the implementation of work plan  Submit monthly work plan / activity calendar with program team  Manage data collection and reporting from designated health facilities on monthly basis  Regular follow up for supply chain management of contraceptives and FP data reporting from facility and district level.  Liaison with DOH, PWD and Community influencers for community engagement activities of district  Supervise ongoing BCC activities at community level and provide technical support to CE officers  Work with health facility managers for development of data collection mechanism for cohort client enrolment and implementation research  Monthly workplan for Program/Community Engagement & Research activities of respective district to be shared with Provincial Manager  Prepare / compile monthly reports in accordance with work plan  Act as a team leader of district level technical team provide them support in planning and management.  Plan and execute monthly community engagement activities of district in consultation with DPWO/SM from PWD and DC IRMNCH/SO/LHS from DOH  Process monitoring of activities at field level in order to ensure the accurate translation of strategies into activities at ground level.  Facilitate the donor, government and Jhpiego team visits as and when required.  Represent Jhpiego at district level at all relevant forums. 
Required Qualifications  Graduate or equivalent degree in Social or Management Sciences. Master degree will be preferred  Minimum 6-7 years of coordination & project management experience especially in Health Sector (Experience in Maternal Newborn & Child Health and Family Planning would be an advantage)  Demonstrated skills including verbal and written communication, strategic thinking, and organizational teambuilding and capacity development  Should have preferably worked in project or field related activities.  Strong interpersonal, team management, Information and Communication Technology report writing skills  Capacity for analyzing technical and programmatic issues; experience developing solutions, assisting in the design of related operational research, and translating research into practice.  Experience in promoting partnerships and relationships with stakeholder groups, particularly the Department of Health and PWD  Experience supervising staff with strong leadership skills and a supportive management style  Ability to work in a complex environment, responsible for multiple tasks and produce high quality results in a short time  Computer skills: MS Office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint Ability and willingness for frequent travel to the field sites  Excellent coordination skills with demonstrated ability to work cooperatively as a member of a team.  Ability to ensure adherence to applicable laws and regulations.  Demonstrated ability to exercise confidentiality and professionalism. 
Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted and note that the successful candidate selected for this position will be subject to a pre-employment background check.The position will be closed for further applications once it is successfully filled. We will be conducting interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage interested candidates to apply at their earliest convenience. Thank you for your interest in joining our team.Jhpiego is an equal opportunity/Affirmative Action employer and does not discriminate in its selection and employment practices. Female candidates are strongly encouraged to apply. Failure to follow the instructions of applying, your application would be denied.For further information about Jhpiego, visit our website at www.jhpiego.org

We believe that we can present a solution to your every problem complementing innovation with sustainability. Our services are available across the globe in a time zone aligned manner.Position Purpose:We are looking for a Project Manager to be responsible for handling our companys ongoing projects. She will be working closely with your team members to ensure that all project requirements, deadlines, and schedules are on track. Responsibilities include submitting project deliverables, preparing status reports, and establishing effective project communication plans as well as the proper execution of said plans.Education & Professional Qualification: Degree(s)/Major(s): Bachelors or Masters in a relevant field from a reputed local/foreign University. Certification(s): Not mandatory, but certification in a relevant field is a plus. 
Experience:Minimum 3 years of relevant experience as a Project Manager.Responsibilities: Responsible for delivering solid, modular code for current assignment. Responsible for code review of junior, intermediate and senior team members, advises and provides feedback to management on individual team performance at each review cycle. In coordination with Sales, participates in client calls for discovery when necessary for custom technical projects. Assists in providing estimates for custom development projects. Keeps an eye on technology trends and workflow best practices to ensure build process and toolkit keeps pace with broader industry, Investigate and develop skills in new technologies. Develops and maintains collaborative relationships with the creative team, project management and client stakeholders. Discussing potential projects and their parameters with clients, executives, and software team leads. Planning out the blueprints for software projects, including defining the scope, allocating resources, setting deadlines, laying out communication strategies, and indicating tests and maintenance. Assembling and leading the project team. Participating in and supervising each stage of the project. Ensuring each project stays on schedule and adheres to the deadlines. Creating a project budget and ensuring the project adheres to the budget as closely as possible. Determining and overseeing consistent testing, evaluation, and troubleshooting of all products in all stages of completion. Tracking milestones, deliverables, and change requests. Serving as a liaison to communicate information regarding changes, milestones reached, and other pertinent information. Delivering completed software products to clients and performing regular checks on the products performance. 
Requirements Experience in a scrum master role. Familiarity with software development. Proven experience in influencing and facilitating Key discussions. Ability to work on determining design approach and capability of making estimation and planning. Experience collaborating with clients on business process enhancements. Capable of creating functional designs and interpreting technical designs. Excellent knowledge of Scrum techniques and artifacts (such as definition of done, user stories, automated testing, backlog refinement, prioritization). Good knowledge of other Agile frameworks (Kanban, XP etc.). Excellent communication. Problem-solving and conflict-resolution ability. Scrum master certification is a plus.

All employment associated decisions are based on an individuals merit.

About the job
            

 
Job Overview:As a Senior Database Administrator, you will play a critical role in ensuring the integrity, performance, and availability of our integration platform's database system, which is powered by MS SQL. You will be responsible for managing and optimizing large volumes of data, ensuring data security, and providing technical expertise to support the growth and stability of our platform.Major responsibilities include: Database Management: Design, implement, and maintain database systems using MS SQL Server.Ensure data consistency, integrity, and security.Monitor and manage database performance, optimizing queries, and indexes for efficient data retrieval.
Data Migration and Integration: Plan and execute data migrations, upgrades, and integrations.Collaborate with development teams to design and implement effective ETL processes.
Backup and Recovery: Establish and maintain backup and recovery procedures to protect against data loss.Create disaster recovery plans and perform periodic testing.
Security and Compliance: Implement and maintain database security policies, user access controls, and encryption.Ensure compliance with relevant data protection and privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).
Performance Tuning: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks through query optimization and system tuning.Monitor resource utilization and proactively address issues.
High Availability and Scaling: Set up and manage database replication, clustering, and failover mechanisms for high availability.Plan and implement strategies for scaling database systems as the company grows.
Automation and Scripting: Develop scripts and automate routine database maintenance tasks to improve efficiency.
Troubleshooting and Support: Respond to database-related incidents, diagnose issues, and provide timely resolutions.Provide technical support and guidance to the development and operations teams.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of database configurations, procedures, and best practices.
Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Developers, QA, and Support Team.Provide expertise and guidance for architectural decisions related to data management.
  A minimum of 5 years of Database Administration (DBA) is required for this role. Must Haves: Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Database Administrator, with a focus on MS SQL Server.Strong knowledge of database design principles, normalization, and optimization.Proficiency in T-SQL, Server Integration Services (SSIS), SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), and other SQL Server tools.Experience with database performance tuning and monitoring tools.Familiarity with database security and compliance standards.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work well under pressure.Excellent communication and teamwork skills.Strong knowledge of SQL Server performance tuning, indexing, and optimization techniques.Experience with database schema design and normalization.At least 2 years of Team Lead experience is required.Excellent leadership and mentoring skills.
 Nice to Haves: C# .NET experience is a major plus.Knowledge of .NET Framework, JavaScript, and HTML.SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS) is a plus.REST API experience is a PLUS or working experience on integrations.Experience with other database types like Mongo and Redis is a plus.Familiarity with Agile methodologies.Relevant certifications (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate) are a plus.Knowledge of cloud-based database solutions such as AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, and Azure SQL.Familiarity with Business Intelligence tools such as Power BI.
 Personality Specification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.CREATIVE Adaptable/FlexibleDependableLove Learning new Things.Detail-orientedHighly analytical Initiative-mindedGreat Problem-Solving SkillsCommunicate well with people at multiple levels of the organization.Effectively manage their projects and work well with the team
 Perks of Joining Autymate:At Autymate, we offer more than just a job; we foster enriching careers. Countless benefits: Unmatched Compensation: Benefit from our industry-leading pay and comprehensive benefits, securing health coverage for you and your family.Shared Success: Enjoy a direct piece of our success through our profit-sharing program.Personal and Professional Growth: Accelerate your growth through frequent high-quality training sessions and a personalized professional development fund.Flexible Workspace: Thrive in an adaptable environment offering flexibility and remote work options.Holistic Wellness: We care for your overall health with sports contributions and comprehensive outpatient coverage.Inspiring Culture: Be a part of our passionate, supportive team and earn semi-annual performance-based bonuses.Generous Time-off Policy: Enjoy ample leave days, balancing your personal and professional life.
 Path to Success:Join us as an esteemed Tier 6 Senior-level and envisage the possibilities for growth within Autymate's unique 16-tier progression structure. With each step, unlock greater responsibilities, rewarding pay increments, improved benefits, and a larger share of our revenue share program. Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, synchronization, modeling divergences and data inconsistencies.
What we offer: The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented product people and engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are reshaping industries and making a difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our product people and engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.If you’re passionate about designing and delivering high-quality software, we'd love to hear from you.What You Will Be Doing Breaking down high-level milestones into requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteriaIterating with our designers to transform use cases and user stories into functional UX/UI prototypesTaking any important technical decisions you feel strongly about (e.g., data model, 3rd-party patterns to use)Reviewing and accepting engineering deliverables, ensuring it meets all of your requirements

Basic Requirements At least 3 years of hands-on experience working as a software engineer.Knowledge of relational database fundamentals and hands-on experience writing SQL.Experience defining product/technical requirements and peer reviewing/accepting engineering deliverables.An openness to learn to heavily use generative A.I. in your day-to-day work.

OverviewJhpiego, a global leader in improving health care for women and families, seeks a Provincial Manager, based in Lahore, to oversee and coordinate the implementation of BMGF funded family planning program in province of Punjab, to be carried out in close collaboration with the Department of Health (DoH), Population Welfare Department (PWD) and with other relevant partners, with the unified purpose of contributing to the FP2030 targets by enhancing women’s access to quality FP services. The Provincial Manager will be responsible for overall program management at provincial and district level and provide guidance to district team members. Under the supervision of Senior Program Manager, Provincial Manager will be responsible for achieving planned results through effective coordination with relevant departments and teams and perform following activities:Responsibilities  Provide leadership and direction for the program's implementation at the provincial and district level, ensuring alignment with the program proposal and objectives  Develop program implementation plans for provincial and district teams, aligned with program proposal, in close collaboration with research and finance leads  Foster productive relationships with provincial and district government departments (DoH & PWD), local authorities, and other relevant partners to facilitate program coordination and cooperation  Work with Senior Program Manager and technical advisors on program and technical materials as and when required  Contribute in smooth execution of BCC activities through collaborative working with District Coordinators  Support Senior Program Manager in developing activities timelines and data reporting, aligned with program proposal  Efficiently allocate and manage human, material, and financial resources required for program activities in the province and districts  Ensure continuous monitoring of program activities at district level, as well as timely and accurate evaluation and reporting of progress toward the achievement of program goals and objectives  Present progress, achievements and lessons learned to key stakeholders including DoH, PWD and other relevant partners.  Supervise and manage provincial and district staff; align their efforts with program goals  Contribute in annual work planning process and reporting to Donor  Generate and ensure timely submission of program reports to donor through collaborative working with communication specialist.  Provide timely program updates to Senior Program Manager, relevant departments and TAs  Participate in meetings with concerned departments and partners for negotiating and briefing stakeholders, including technical working group and government officials  Identify potential risks to program implementation within the province and districts and work with the team to develop mitigation plans. Report significant issues to the Senior Program Manager  Provide support in the design, analysis, and synthesis of interventions  Ensure the quality and effectiveness of program interventions at the provincial and district level. Troubleshoot and resolve any issues as they arise  Formulate productive working relationships with counterparts from the DoH, PWD and other organizations working in family planning in order to disseminate, discuss, and promote consistent evidence-based approaches on a provincial level 
Required Qualifications  Masters’ degree in social sciences or public health or relevant field with 5 - 7 years’ experience in program development and implementation of family planning programs, preferably in Pakistan  Proven leadership skills and expertise in the management of health programs and program staff  Knowledge of competency-based training, performance and quality improvement approaches  Ability to develop strategic and programmatic plans in cooperation with concerned departments/other stakeholders/donors  Comprehensive understanding of evidence-based family planning interventions  Ability to develop working relationships with counterparts of varying levels of seniority and backgrounds to implement program activities  Strong decision-making skills, team player accustomed to building team capacity, delegating work to teams  Excellent verbal, written and presentation skills  Ability to travel within country 
Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted and note that the successful candidate selected for this position will be subject to a pre-employment background check.The position will be closed for further applications once it is successfully filled. We will be conducting interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage interested candidates to apply at their earliest convenience. Thank you for your interest in joining our team.Jhpiego is an equal opportunity/Affirmative Action employer and does not discriminate in its selection and employment practices. We need an intuitive marketer who formulates sharp hypotheses, tests them rapidly, learns from the outcomes, and scales their strategies. While you will own the entire gamut of strategic marketing, you'll have the freedom and resources to enlist agency support when execution demands it.This isn't just another job; it's an invitation to shape the future. Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI and that are reshaping industries and changing the way we work and learn.Our strategic product line includes: Crossover: An AI-powered hiring platform that sifts through millions of applicants per year to find the top 1% of global remote talent, making high-paying jobs accessible to professionals worldwide, regardless of their location.gt.school: An online education platform that uses advanced data collection, algorithms, and AI-generated content to empower students learn at their own pace. Our adaptive learning system fills knowledge gaps, accelerates learning, and helps students quickly master a whole grade level on a subject within weeks.Data-driven Sales: This initiative leverages data and AI algorithms to streamline the sales process across a portfolio of over 100 software products. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, modeling divergences and data synchronization.
What we offer: The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, AWS serverless and no-code/low-code patterns.The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!What You Will Be Doing Building modern web apps using Angular accompanied by top-notch libraries and tools.Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
What You Won’t Be Doing Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.
About TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!Working with CrossoverThis is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Supertouch is considered a market leader in its chosen product categories.Due to increased growth, Supertouch has expanded its manufacturing operations in Pakistan by investing in a state-of-the-art facility to produce high-quality technical workwear.Job Title: Manager CostingJob Summary: The “Manager Costing” will be responsible for overseeing and managing all aspects of costing related to garment production within the factory. This includes cost analysis, budgeting, pricing, and cost control to ensure the factory's profitability and competitiveness in the market.Key Responsibilities: Cost Analysis:
Analyze the costs associated with all stages of garment production, including materials, labor, overhead, and other related expenses.Conduct regular cost audits to identify areas for cost reduction and efficiency improvements.Monitor and report on variances between actual and projected costs.
Pricing Strategies:
Develop pricing strategies for different garment products to ensure competitiveness in the market while maintaining profitability.Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to set competitive pricing for products.Consider market trends and customer demands when setting prices.
Budgeting:
Prepare and manage the factory's annual budget, including cost projections and revenue forecasts.Ensure that the factory operates within the allocated budget and takes corrective actions when necessary.
Vendor Negotiation:
Negotiate with suppliers and vendors to secure cost-effective raw materials, trims, and other inputs.Build strong relationships with suppliers to obtain favorable terms and conditions.
Cost Control:
Implement cost control measures to minimize wastage and improve production efficiency.Identify opportunities for cost savings and work with cross-functional teams to implement cost reduction strategies.
Costing Software and Systems:
Utilize cost estimation software and systems to accurately calculate product costs.Ensure that the factory is using up-to-date technology for efficient cost management.
Documentation and Reporting:
Maintain comprehensive records of all cost-related data, contracts, and agreements.Prepare regular reports on cost analysis, budget performance, and cost-saving initiatives.

Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI and that are reshaping industries and changing the way we work and learn.Our strategic product line includes: Crossover: An AI-powered hiring platform that sifts through millions of applicants per year to find the top 1% of global remote talent, making high-paying jobs accessible to professionals worldwide, regardless of their location.gt.school: An online education platform that uses advanced data collection, algorithms, and AI-generated content to empower students learn at their own pace. Our adaptive learning system fills knowledge gaps, accelerates learning, and helps students quickly master a whole grade level on a subject within weeks.Data-driven Sales: This initiative leverages data and AI algorithms to streamline the sales process across a portfolio of over 100 software products. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, modeling divergences and data synchronization.
What we offer: The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, AWS serverless and no-code/low-code patterns.The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!What You Will Be Doing Building modern web apps using Angular accompanied by top-notch libraries and tools.Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
What You Won’t Be Doing Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
Basic RequirementsSenior Software Engineer key responsibilities At least 3 years of experience writing frontend code (any framework)At least 1 year of experience writing frontend code in Angular.At least 3 years of experience writing backend code (any framework).An openness to learn to use generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.
Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.
About TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!Working with CrossoverThis is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.What to expect next: You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.
Important! If you do not receive an email from us: First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

Job Desception:
About the job
            

 
Our Purpose here at Get Licensed is to make our world a safer place, and our Product Promise is to make the Security Industry more efficient by leveraging technology. We also have a People Promise, as without people we are nothing - we believe that looking after our people is paramount, and the pathway to success. Our People Promise is to provide joy, knowledge and prosperity for our team members, customers, and shareholders.Get Licensed is a fast-paced technology business at heart (the majority of our team are developers or tech wizards), and we are at an incredibly exciting stage of our business, having grown 60% year-on-year since 2020. We have ambitious plans to significantly scale our existing business, broaden our product suite, and continue to profitably grow revenue year on year, with a clear roadmap of how we're going to get there.At this incredibly exciting stage of our business, we are looking for a Facilities Administrator to join our team and contribute to the smooth operation of our office environment by managing various administrative tasks including inventory management, procurement, building maintenance, vendor management, and overseeing a team of office support staff.Key Responsibilities:Inventory Management: Maintain accurate records of office assets, IT equipments, and supplies.Conduct regular audits to ensure asset tracking and prevent losses.Coordinate with different departments to ensure proper allocation and usage of assets.
Procuring Office Supplies: Identify office supply needs and source quality materials at competitive prices.Maintain relationships with suppliers to ensure timely delivery of office supplies.Monitor inventory levels and reorder supplies as needed to avoid shortages.
Dealing with Building Maintenance: Collaborate with facilities management to address office maintenance and repair needs.Coordinate maintenance activities, including repairs, cleaning, and renovations.Ensure a safe and comfortable working environment for employees.
Managing Transport for Employees: Organise transportation services for employees as required.Address transportation-related issues and ensure a seamless commuting experience.
Vendor Management: Establish and maintain relationships with various vendors, including office supplies, IT equipment, and transportation services.Negotiate contracts and agreements with vendors to secure favourable terms.Evaluate vendor performance and provide feedback to ensure quality service.
Leading a Team of Office Support Staff: Supervise and lead a team of office boys, assigning duties and shifts effectively.Provide guidance, training, and performance feedback to team members.Foster a positive and collaborative work environment among the office support staff.
Requirements: Bachelor's degreeProven experience in administrative roles, including inventory management and vendor coordination.Strong organisational skills with attention to detail and ability to multitask.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.Proficiency in using office software (MS Office, spreadsheet software, etc.).Demonstrated leadership skills and the ability to manage a team effectively.Problem-solving attitude with a proactive approach to challenges.
Expected BehavioursWe are committed to achieving excellence, whilst having fun and being highly curious. We are passionate about hiring fantastic individuals who thrive in an open, fast-paced and collaborative environment, who are accountable to themselves, take responsibility from day one, and are willing to roll their sleeves up to get stuff done.There are certain behaviours that we expect from our colleagues, and the key ones are set out below. Fundamentally we expect everyone at Get Licensed to Do The Right Thing. We measure performance against these behaviours as part of each employee’s quarterly review: Be empathetic — Be kind and treat others how you would like to be treatedRemain curious — ask questions, continually learn, and strive for betterEmpower people — share your knowledge, lend a helping hand, and make people feel valuedThink big - Think differently, be agile, act on great ideas quickly – there is always a better way of doing somethingDelivery quality - Work to a standard of which you are proud - be efficient, take ownership, deliver and celebrate successes

Implementation and testing of protection schemes for power substation equipment installed on 220kV, 132kV, 66kV & 11 kV transmission network. Financial Planning and Controlling of Sectional REVEX and CAPEX budget. Management of all the processes of project & procurement from initiation till closing. Responsible for inventory management processes of department Preparation / review of scope of work for Protection system rehabilitation projects. Prequalification of new protection relays as per requirement Overall monitoring of protection system rehabilitation projects Provide technical support to DGM as well as field staff in resolution of critical system problems Provide support to higher management for completion of official tasks Interdepartmental coordination for smooth execution of official tasks Arrange PPEs & SPEs for each employee of the Section Professional mentoring of subordinates and develop a highly safe culture. Ensure documentation of each and every activity for record as per ISO compliance. Compliance of KE SOPs, departmental SOPs relating to installation & testing as designed in HSEQ guidelines/directions.
EducationBE (Electrical/Electronics) QualifiedKnowledge  Sound knowledge of different Protection Schemes Well versed with Protection Relay Settings and Calculations Good knowledge of Conventional, GIS and HIS Grid gadgets. Practical knowledge of Safety procedures and guidelines.
ExperienceMinimum 5 years of experience.CompetenciesCustomer CentricAccountableRespectfulEnergisedSafeLeading ChangeLeading PeopleLeading ResultsLeading SelfArea Of Responsibilities  Procurement and Inventory Management. 20% Provides feedback to DGM GSP Department regarding the requirement for replacement and upgrading of protection gadgets in the section. Initiate procurement case of the approved budgetary items by creating technical specifications and MR. Appraise Technical submittals from different bidders for each procurement case. Preserve proper track record of the MR/PR and PO till delivery of the material from Central Store. In charge for inventory management process of Department. 100% Processing of gate-passes, capitalization of the material and FATA/FADA updating. Execution of Annual Preventive Maintenance 20% Keep track record of all PPE's, SOP's and all relevant materials required during APM and coordinates with DGM GSP for required material well before APM. Ensure completion of all testing activities during APM within stipulated timeline complying to all standard testing protocols. Attend all discrepancies during APM as directed by the Higher authorities. Timely completion of APM testing Performa and submission to DGM GSP for review. Timely closure of work orders in SAP for all APMs. Ensure compliance of 100% safety norms during each activity in the APM. Replacement of Obsolete & Faulty Protection gadgets under Predictive & Corrective Maintenance 20% Execute replacement of faulty protection gadgets in the section as per discrepancies observed during APMs as well as regular feedback from LDC/Operation’s holdup issues to run smooth system. Conduct testing and commissioning of Protective Relays allied with Grid equipment. Testing of control circuit checks, interlocking, alarm, indicating and checking of functions. Replacement of obsolete protection gadgets under system rehabilitation drive as per directives of GM/DGM GSP. Ensure compliance of “SOP for replacement & testing of protection relays”. Ensure compliance of relevant safety, quality and environmental issues and controls within defined area of activity. Timely closure of work orders in SAP for all activities. 100% Processing of gate-passes, capitalization of the material and FATA/FADA updating.
Area of Responsibility Continued  Fault Analysis & Remedial Action 15% Monitor and resolve all protection related issues pertaining to 220 / 132 / 66 / 11 kV grid stations during office & odd hours as forwarded/communicated by LDC/GM/DGM, immediately mobilize GSP Engineer along with testing team to the site with all necessary testing tools/tackles and keep updating all higher ups regarding progress till rectification of fault. Immediately self-mobilize as and when required. Ensure business process optimization and optimal utilization of resource according to the Company vision. Also ensure rectification of 100% faults with optimal time and allocated resource. Analysis of tripping and take remedial action on the recommendations of RCA's to avoid indiscriminate tripping. Review and revise protection settings / calculations consistent with changes in System configuration. Submit Weekly & Monthly Progress reports of the Section to the DGM (GSP). Interdepartmental co-ordination for smooth business run 15% Coordination with other departments for miscellaneous works i.e. GSM, PID, TELECOM, Generation, TMOH, TMUG, SCADA, AMS, Meter department, 11KV S/S, Supply chain, vendors etc Submission of Grid related technical / non-technical reports to higher ups for system improvement & possible solution. Provide technical assistance and support to the DGM (GSP) and down the line. Ensure that each employee of the Section has received an initial safety orientation before beginning of work. Investigate all incidents in the area and report the findings to GM/DGM (GSP) accordingly. Study and review in detail the scope of work (SOW), technical specifications and BOQ of the Project & Design of control and protection schemes for new substations and extensions. Witnessing of Site Acceptance Test by GSP Engineer for timely accomplishment of project. Prepares all Technical Specifications & FAT/SAT protocols pertaining to GSP related business in coordination with DGM (GSP). People Management 10% Request/process Job Request Form (JRF) as per requirement and employ new talent through proper screening. Job oriented training of sub-ordinates and newly inducted engineers. Build high performance team by conducting in-house trainings to enhance their capabilities. Target goal settings and conduct continuous dialogue for better progress. Develop proactive approach and competitive ideas to support written feedback from Managers/Engineers/Staff for improvement of Departmental business run complying with KE values. Adopt and ensure safety procedures for each employee as well as equipment down the line. Conduct weekly awareness sessions / meetings and ensure daily toolbox talks for sites, in order to ensure ZERO minor/major accidents. Ensure proper up keeping of grid log books, grid maintenance books, grid drawings/schematics, guidebooks, instruction manuals& support documents. Provoke behavior competencies among employees for personality inclination to achieve job role according to KE values.

Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI and that are reshaping industries and changing the way we work and learn.Our strategic product line includes: Crossover: An AI-powered hiring platform that sifts through millions of applicants per year to find the top 1% of global remote talent, making high-paying jobs accessible to professionals worldwide, regardless of their location.gt.school: An online education platform that uses advanced data collection, algorithms, and AI-generated content to empower students learn at their own pace. Our adaptive learning system fills knowledge gaps, accelerates learning, and helps students quickly master a whole grade level on a subject within weeks.Data-driven Sales: This initiative leverages data and AI algorithms to streamline the sales process across a portfolio of over 100 software products. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, modeling divergences and data synchronization.
What we offer: The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, AWS serverless and no-code/low-code patterns.The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!What You Will Be Doing Building modern web apps using Angular accompanied by top-notch libraries and tools.Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day development work.
About TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!Working with CrossoverThis is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.What to expect next: You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.
Important! If you do not receive an email from us: First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

Job Desception:
About the job
            

 
Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 50 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan.JOB PURPOSEAs a Lead Treasury Operations at Careem, your primary role is to ensure the efficient management of financial resources by assisting in monthly forecasting, fund allocation, and loan reconciliation at the console level. You will play a crucial role in maintaining accurate financial records, managing intercompany loans and interest, and coordinating repatriation efforts across local markets. Additionally, you will serve as a liaison between local markets and regulatory banks, ensuring compliance with local regulations. Your responsibilities extend to managing bank accounts, facilitating signatory updates, and aligning procurement and payroll teams on banking details. Your attention to detail and collaboration with cross-functional teams will contribute to the smooth operation of our treasury function, guarantee management, and financial reporting, ultimately supporting our financial stability and growth.Key AccountabilitiesKey deliverables of this positions are:Forecast And Fund Management Assist in preparing monthly forecasts (MDD) and arrange funds at Careem FZ LLC at the console level.Provide funds to the markets in alignment with approved budgets.
Intercompany Loan Management Record and reconcile all Intercompany loans at Careem console level and with Uber.Record and reconcile Intercompany Interest over the IC loan and Uber interest. Plan and execute IC Loan Repatriation from local markets. Liaison between local markets and respective regulatory banks for local regulation compliance on repatriation.
Banking Operations Compile and maintain all master bank account data at one platform, including registered signatories and commercial aspects.Ensure timely updating of signatories with all banks.Open Citi bank accounts across all BU's and manage the closure of local bank accounts.Implement Uber signatory additions across the Careem accounts.Implement a Live balance view of 40+ bank accounts at Citibank portal.
Cross-functional Collaboration Liaison between local finance, treasury, and Uber teams to update signatories.Collaborate with Citi team on the required BU file format.Align procurement and payroll teams on updating supplier and colleague banking details on Oracle.Ensure auto-generation of BU file in Oracle with the ERP team.Ensure the auto-generated BU File is transmitted to Citi bank without any manual intervention.Liaison between ERP, local finance, and Citi bank teams to ensure smooth H2H connectivity.
Risk Management And Reporting Manage Bank Guarantees, including issuance, refunding, and overall management at the UAE level.Provide monthly Bank Guarantee schedule reporting to Uber.Handle console-level reporting for Post Dated Cheques.Conduct Bank vs. GL comparison reporting to ensure accurate closing balances.Clear GLs while considering audit points.Generate User Access Reports of all users and authorizers for Uber across all bank accounts within Careem.Oversee treasury-related Oracle transactions
QualificationsQUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE MBA Finance/ ACCA or CA Qualified / CIMA Qualified
Experience 4-5 Years of experience in finance
What We’ll Provide YouWe offer colleagues the opportunity to drive impact in the region while they learn and grow. As a Careem colleague you will be able to:  Work and learn from great minds by joining a community of inspiring colleagues.  Put your passion to work in a purposeful organisation dedicated to creating impact in a region with a lot of untapped potential.  Explore new opportunities to learn and grow every day.  Enjoy the flexibility that comes with the trust of being an owner; work in a hybrid style with a mix of days at the office and at home, and remotely from any country in the world for 30 days a year with unlimited vacation days per year.  Access to healthcare benefits and fitness reimbursements for health activities including: gym, health club and training classes.
